title: BARBARA & KENT
description: Draw, and dive into the best restroom rush yet, Barbara & Kent â€“ where ultimate relief is the final goal! Barbara & Kent is the hilarious and intense game where your thinking and drawing skills are put to the test. Guide them to their personal restrooms by drawing unique paths for them. But be cautious! A single collision and it's all down the drain! Don't forget to dodge menacing obstacles, or it's game over. Every draw counts in this frantic rush to the restroom! So grab your pen and help them find the ultimate relief they desire in Barbara & Kent!
